title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 8: Specificity — Route/Alpine Simulation
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Simulate target route: pacing, fueling, gear handling, exposure tolerance.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Sim day: 3–4 blocks x30' climb/scramble + 10' transitions (rope/gear)
Strength (power): 3x2 trap bar jump + MB throws 4x6
Nutrition rehearsal: fluids/electrolytes/carbs as race day

notes: Week 1: broken simulations; Week 2: full simulation (safety first).
